mainEntity.name: How can I apply for a job at Your Company?

acceptedAnswer.text: Visit our Careers page, select the role that matches your skills, and click Apply. You can upload your resume directly.

mainEntity.name: What happens after I submit my application?

acceptedAnswer.text: Our recruitment team reviews your application. If shortlisted, you'll receive an invitation for a screening or interview.
